message: Hi Bob, I'm interested in selling this product to you. I think it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a valuable item. I'm willing to offer it to you for $150.
I'm interested in the product, but $150 is a bit high for me. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $100. I'm willing to pay $100 for the product.
I understand you're looking for a better price, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer the product to you for $125.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, $125 is still a bit above my budget. I'd like to make another counteroffer of $110. I'm willing to pay $110 for the product.
I'm starting to think we're getting close to a deal, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer the product to you for $115.
I appreciate your willingness to make another concession, Alice. However, $115 is still a bit above my budget. I'd like to make another counteroffer of $105. I'm willing to pay $105 for the product.
